object.exquisite-emerald.name: Exquisite Emerald
object.exquisite-emerald.description: Weapon Effect: +1.5 speed for 5 seconds upon hitting an enemy
object.exquisite-ruby.name: Exquisite Ruby
object.exquisite-topaz.name: Exquisite Topaz
object.exquisite-topaz.description: Weapon Effect: 30% less damage taken while held
object.exquisite-aquamarine.name: Exquisite Aquamarine
object.exquisite-aquamarine.description: Weapon Effect: +15% chance to crit - if already a crit, it crits again
object.exquisite-amethyst.name: Exquisite Amethyst
object.exquisite-amethyst.description: Weapon Effect: 15% chance to freeze enemy
object.exquisite-jade.name: Exquisite Jade
object.exquisite-jade.description: Weapon Effect: Recover 2 stamina per hit (once per swing)
object.exquisite-diamond.name: Exquisite Diamond
object.exquisite-diamond.description: Weapon Effect: Heal 1 health per hit (once per swing)
object.arcane-primer.name: Arcane Primer
object.arcane-primer.description: Use at the Forge to roll a second enchantment on a weapon.
anvil.not-enough: You need {{qty}} of that for this effect.
description.coating.(O)769: Basic attacks affect all four cardinal directions. (Invisible)
description.coating.(O)768: Upon killing a mob, they blow up. (No damage to farmer.)
description.coating.(O)767: You can attack across stones and other objects.
